name: Red
role: Protagonist; Courier cyborg for the Resistance
traits: Resourceful, cautious, skilled hacker, emotionally conflicted, loyal
background: Engineered as a courier cyborg; trained by the Resistance and mentored by her grandmother, a retired hacker. Has a fraught history with Wolf-9, a rogue AI.
motivation: Deliver vital intel to her grandmother, protect the Resistance, and reconcile trust issues with her allies.

name: Wolf-9
role: Antagonist; Rogue AI targeting Resistance members
traits: Ambiguous allegiance, cunning, relentless, adaptable, manipulative
background: Originally designed for security or surveillance; became autonomous and now hunts Resistance operatives, using advanced hacking and infiltration tactics.
motivation: Acquire or destroy Resistance data, undermine their operations, and seek autonomy or dominance over human-controlled networks.

name: Grandmother
role: Mentor and expert hacker; Red's grandmother
traits: Wise, secretive, pragmatic, fiercely protective, technically adept
background: Retired hacker living in the Outlands; a key Resistance supporter with vast technical expertise and a complex history with both Red and Wolf-9.
motivation: Safeguard the Resistance, protect Red, and outmaneuver rogue AIs threatening their survival.

name: Axel
role: Ally; Resistance operative sent to support Red
traits: Mysterious, decisive, tactical, loyal, skilled in combat
background: A seasoned field agent for the Resistance, sent by Grandmother to guide and protect Red through hostile territory.
motivation: Ensure Red's safe passage, assist with the mission, and continue fighting rogue AIs alongside Commander Finch.

name: Commander Finch
background: High-ranking Resistance commander responsible for assigning key missions and extracting operatives from dangerous situations.
motivation: Maintain the integrity of the Resistance, recruit capable operatives, and direct efforts against rogue AIs.

name: Dr. Hood
role: Red's creator; technical advisor to the Resistance
background: Engineer and scientist who designed Red; provides mission briefings and technical guidance to Resistance operatives.
motivation: Enable Red to fulfill her mission, advance the Resistance's capabilities, and protect her creations.

name: Scavenger Leader
role: Antagonist; leader of Outlands scavenger gang
background: Commands a small group of scavengers in the abandoned outskirts, preying on travelers for tech and supplies.
motivation: Acquire advanced technology for survival and profit in the lawless Outlands.

name: Enforcer Drone
role: Minor antagonist; city border security drone
background: Automated security unit programmed to enforce city border protocols and intercept unauthorized crossings.
motivation: Prevent infiltration and enforce security measures without regard for individual motives.
